entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 8:00 PM PST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain

Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 91 %

Wind: SSE 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 February 2023
